name: Frozen in Time
description:
Play through the jumping puzzle before the meteor hits. Collect the 4 needed fragments to stop the time and break the loop.

Controls:

Move [W A S D]

Jump [Space]

Reset [R]

Notes:

  • Orange pressure plates spawn new platforms to reach fragments while standing on it.
  • The players path out of the last 2 loops get saved and shown as shadows wich can keep pressure plates activated.
  • Loops can be stopped by pressing [R]
